item.title: How reliable is Monero? Can it replace Bitcoin?
item.description:
How reliable is Monero? Can it replace Bitcoin?

Answer: It seems that Bitcoin is moving to a regulation controlled field, so fans of unregulated markets are moving to Monero. See a relative post:Darknet Customers Are Demanding Bitcoin Alternative Monero

item.title: Russia Leader Confirms Nation Will Not Ban Bitcoin | Bitconnect
item.description:
Russia Leader Confirms Nation Will Not Ban Bitcoin | Bitconnect

Russia Leader Confirms Nation Will Not Ban Bitcoin ​We have been following the constant rhetoric and confusion out of Russia on what to do with Bitcoin. One month, they say ban Bitcoin and throw people in jail. The next month, they say Bitcoin will be free to use.

item.title: How to Make Bitcoin Payments More Efficient in Online Gaming
item.description:
How to Make Bitcoin Payments More Efficient in Online Gaming

While video & online games are making first small steps towards Bitcoin, gambling is already there. Cointelegraph looks into why cryptocurrency payment systems are still underdeveloped. The talks started in 2011. Back then, entrepreneur Calvin Ayre published a list of his own predictions for online gaming industry in 2012.

item.title: Perfectly Decentralized: Dash Alternative to Fractional Reserves
item.description:
Perfectly Decentralized: Dash Alternative to Fractional Reserves

The last three months have been a period of organization, according to Evan Duffield, creator and lead developer of the cryptographic currency Dash. Now, with the question of scalability from an organizational perspective answered, Duffield says, "it's time to execute." Disclaimer: This article was provided by the Vanbex Group.

item.title: Blocksafe Builds out Gun Safety Blockchain, Will Host Second Crowdsale
item.description:
Blocksafe Builds out Gun Safety Blockchain, Will Host Second Crowdsale

Blocksafe, a blockchain-based system that provides secure access, personal monitoring and control of "smart" guns, will use Lisk sidechain technology to build out its blockchain and will issue a new token for use on that chain called "Trigger" (TRIG). Lisk is a public blockchain platform that provides decentralized blockchain apps.

item.title: Mizuho Bank Dealt Blow in Latest Mt Gox Lawsuit Update - CoinDesk
item.description:
Mizuho Bank Dealt Blow in Latest Mt Gox Lawsuit Update - CoinDesk

A US judge largely denied a bid last week by Mizuho Bank to dismiss charges filed against it in a class action lawsuit tied to the collapse of defunct bitcoin exchange Mt Gox. In a court order dated 26th August, US District Judge Gary Feinerman ruled Mizhuo should face charges related to unjust enrichment and fraudulent concealment in connection with the exchange's failure.

item.title: Test Attack on Krypton, Ethereum Classic Might be Next
item.description:
Test Attack on Krypton, Ethereum Classic Might be Next

Krypton, Ethereum-based network, has recently recovered from a 2-step attack which resulted in a total of 21,465 KR, approximately $3000 USD, being stolen from Bittrex 's wallets. The Krypton team suspects that the attack might have been just a test: attackers might go for other Ethereum-based blockchains such as ETC, for example.
